venue.name: Best Western Executive Court Inn & Conf. Ctr

item.description:
Hi Everyone!  This is going to be a good one!  


Do you have the Guts to get Fermented?  Please join Laurie Driggers, CHHC, AADP, at the Manchester Raw Food Meetup in Manchester, NH on May 13, 2011 at 7:00 p.m. for Fermented Foods 101.  Laurie will teach us about the exciting health benefits of fermented foods and easy techniques for producing delicious fermented foods in the comfort of your own home.  Come learn how fermented foods provide your body with protection, vitality and vibrant health.  Laurie will also be bringing samples of homemade sauerkraut, homemade kombucha and homemade coconut water kefir for all attending to have a taste.         

 Laurie Driggers is a Certified Holistic Health & Lifestyle Coach, a LLCAI Living Foods Chef and the creatrix of the Inspired Health & Happiness Blog.  For more information on Laurie, you can visit her website at http://www.inspiredhealthandhappiness.com or her Inspired Health & Happiness Blog at http://inspiredhealthandhappinessblog.com/nice-to-meet-you/.

 

Please bring an organic raw vegan dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring...a salad...fruit or veggie would be great.  Can't wait to see everyone!

 

Adults $2

Children:  Always free!
item.how_to_find_us: Friday May 13 Potluck and Fermenting Class!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck and Fermenting Class!
